assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: KAMCO Investment Company K.S.C.P. is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm also provides wealth management, forward trading, access to IPOs, and advisory services to its clients. It provides its services to individual, institutional clients, ultra-high net worth individuals, high net worth clients, family offices, sovereigns, endowments, foundations, and corporate. The firm manages customized portfolios and mutual funds for its clients. It invests in the public equity, fixed income, and alternative investments markets across the globe with a focus on the MENA region. The firm employs quantitative analysis to make its investments. It makes its investments in the securities of companies operating across diversified sectors. The firm conducts in-house research to make its investments. KAMCO Investment Company K.S.C.P. was formerly known as Kipco Asset Management Company K.S.C.C. till December 07, 2014. KAMCO Investment Company K.S.C.P. was founded in September 28, 1998 and is based in Sharq, Kuwait. KAMCO Investment Company K.S.C.P. operates as a subsidiary of United Gulf Bank B.S.C. (E.C.).
